            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The Salt Spring Island, Water Preservation Society (WPS), FreshWater Catalogue (SSIFWC) project is about raising community awareness of an island’s freshwater (surface and groundwater), helping develop island watershed (stewardship) communities, and supporting data gathering for island freshwater resource quantification modelling and (locally) for water quality monitoring, to help inform island watershed preservation/management activities. 

The datasets includes Db V3 and Db V2.

We are grateful to the Salt Spring Island Foundation for their financial support for our island project.</gco:CharacterString>

fr: eaux de surface et eaux souterraines

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-p7sw-ar57
notes:
The Salt Spring Island, Water Preservation Society (WPS), FreshWater Catalogue (SSIFWC) project is about raising community awareness of an island’s freshwater (surface and groundwater), helping develop island watershed (stewardship) communities, and supporting data gathering for island freshwater resource quantification modelling and (locally) for water quality monitoring, to help inform island watershed preservation/management activities. 

The datasets includes Db V3 and Db V2.

We are grateful to the Salt Spring Island Foundation for their financial support for our island project.

notes_translated.en:
The Salt Spring Island, Water Preservation Society (WPS), FreshWater Catalogue (SSIFWC) project is about raising community awareness of an island’s freshwater (surface and groundwater), helping develop island watershed (stewardship) communities, and supporting data gathering for island freshwater resource quantification modelling and (locally) for water quality monitoring, to help inform island watershed preservation/management activities. 

The datasets includes Db V3 and Db V2.

We are grateful to the Salt Spring Island Foundation for their financial support for our island project.
notes_translated.fr:
Le projet FreshWater Catalogue (SSIFWC) de Salt Spring Island, Water Preservation Society (WPS) vise à sensibiliser la communauté à l'eau douce d'une île (eaux de surface et souterraines), à aider à développer les communautés du bassin versant insulaire (intendance) et à soutenir la collecte de données pour la modélisation de la quantification des ressources en eau douce des îles et (localement) pour la surveillance de la qualité de l'eau, afin d'éclairer les activités de préservation/gestion des bassins versants insulaires. 

Les ensembles de données incluent Db V3 et Db V2.

Nous sommes reconnaissants à la Salt Spring Island Foundation pour son soutien financier à notre projet insulaire.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Salt Spring Island FreshWater Catalogue (SSIFWC)
